channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.description:
Graffiti

item.title: Human urine leaking onto footpath, 13th August
item.description:
There is human urine water dripping into the pavement outside John Lewis on Oxford St. I was bought attention to it because the pigeon group I am on are concerned they only have this to drink in the hot weather and someone keeps removing the fresh water they put down for them. However it is also a human health and safety issue. Best wishes Aneesa

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 301-309, Oxford Street, Fitzrovia, Camden Town, City of Westminster
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Repeated Misuse of Disabled Badge and Obstructive Parking, 13th August
item.description:
This vehicle is repeatedly parking in the wrong place, blocking traffic, and clearly misusing a disabled badge. This is not the first time this has happened and it causes unnecessary disruption.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Station Road, New Southgate, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Again used oil in Colvestone Crescentv, 13th August
item.description:
When you install CCTV on Colvestone Crescent to address ongoing issues with people improperly disposing of rubbish, including used cooking oil, which is an environmental hazard, please can you consider putting up CCTV? Thank you

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Colvestone Crescent, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Man working on cars along Hazel Drive, Erith, 13th August
item.description:
Man working on cars along Hazel Drive, Erith. Caller says that the man has been doing this for many years...there are always engines, loose screws & nails on the road. Lady says she keeps on reporting this but not being addressed
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hazel Drive, Slade Green, London

item.title: Not this crossing but the one at Orme Square (not marked), 13th August
item.description:
Not this crossing but the one at Orme Square. The button to press on the south side for those leaving Kensington Gardens (dogs, children and runners) has lost its knob and can't be activated.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bayswater Road, Kensington, London

item.title: Please collect rubbish from park, 13th August
item.description:
A public event took place in the park on Sunday. It’s now Wednesday afternoon, and large amounts of rubbish, leftover food, and drink containers are still scattered around, awaiting collection. This park already has a serious rat and pigeon problem, so it’s hard to understand why the waste has been left there for three days.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Camberwell Green, Camberwell, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Van dumped on Hayne Road, 13th August
item.description:

item.title: Block drain in courtyard, 13th August
item.description:
This drain is constantly blocked. It smells and needs clearing. When it rains heavy, it creates a very smelly, huge puddle. Can we get this drain cleared and resolve problem of why always getting blocked.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Colville Estate, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
